item.title: VSCode extensions I love
item.description: When it comes to technology, there are thousands of tools you could use. How could you know where to start? For someone who started coding a few years ago, this barrage of information was too vast for me to easily identify. I am no expert, but I found along the way, by experiencing some tools or reading articles as this one, found some interesting plug-ins that I’ll share with you:
